carpet-flying.rule.disablePlayerSpawnCom: Prevents players from abusing it to teleport around.
carpet-flying.rule.displayNamesOnPlayerL: Show server-side displayNames on player list.
Required for player list manipulation rules to work.
Display "[bot] next to Carpet bot names".
carpet-flying.rule.displayNameVanillaTwe: Display "[afk] next to AFK player names".
carpet-flying.rule.enderDragonNoGriefing: Prevent Ender Dragon from breaking any blocks.
